origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnergyAPI.get_company_research_investment', 'description': 'This function provides research and development investment data for companies in the specified industry and size.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companySize', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The size of the companies to focus on, e.g., small, medium, large.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to focus on, e.g., Energy, Technology.'}, {'name': 'count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of companies to return data for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'companies', 'description': 'A list of companies with their research and development investment data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnergyAPI.get_company_research_investment, 它的参数输入如下: 'companySize'是'medium', 'industry'是'Energy', 'count'是'5'.
